scripts.docker:build: docker build --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY=$(grep NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --build-arg DATABASE_URL=$(grep DATABASE_URL .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --build-arg LIVEKIT_URL=$(grep LIVEKIT_URL .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --build-arg LIVEKIT_API_KEY=$(grep LIVEKIT_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --build-arg LIVEKIT_API_SECRET=$(grep LIVEKIT_API_SECRET .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_LIVEKIT_URL=$(grep NEXT_PUBLIC_LIVEKIT_URL .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -t twitch-clone-frontend .
scripts.docker:build:ci: docker build --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY=${NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY} --build-arg DATABASE_URL=${DATABASE_URL} --build-arg LIVEKIT_URL=${LIVEKIT_URL} --build-arg LIVEKIT_API_KEY=${LIVEKIT_API_KEY} --build-arg LIVEKIT_API_SECRET=${LIVEKIT_API_SECRET} --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_LIVEKIT_URL=${NEXT_PUBLIC_LIVEKIT_URL} -t twitch-clone-frontend .
